ingredients.ingredient: ¼ cup finely shredded Parmesan cheese

cookingTips: Finely dice asparagus into small pieces for better binding and texture in tots
Squeeze excess moisture from asparagus to prevent tots from falling apart
Use wet hands to shape tots, or use a small spoon to form them quickly
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Help me make asparagus tots, explaining how to combine and shape the mixture, and how to air fry them until they hold together and are golden.
